attributes.action: Scrap UK speed limit on Motorways, Autobahn style.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Congestion is a huge problem on some of our major roads throughout the UK. Making the motorways limitless for Cars and motorcycles in certain places will reduce journey times, congestion and accidents. Evidence from germany suggests that accident rates in unrestricted areas are actually lower.
